programme.title: Saddam Hussein or the Bogie Man
programme.short_synopsis: How is Saddam Hussein's dictatorship and the Gulf war viewed by the Iraqi people?
programme.medium_synopsis: Whilst Saddam Hussein's Scud missiles attack Israel, Alistair Cooke considers how the 24/7 spontaneous news coverage is being viewed by both the allies and the Iraqis.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: Saddam Hussein or the Bogie Man

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
